pages.title: A Rogues Gallery
pages.text: The world is a dangerous place.  In particular $(l)beware of the $(#301934)Witching Hour$()$(br)$(o)The time between midnight and sunrise when evil forces are at their strongest.$()$(br2)Under the light of the moon undead become particularly dangerous$(br2)In the next few pages you will find threats of an unusual nature; that you might be better prepared should you ever encounter them.$(br2)

pages.name: Illager, Evoker
pages.text: A dangerous magician who can summon Imps called Vexes; as well as conjure spikes from the very earth.$(br2)

pages.name: Illager, Illusioner
pages.text: A sly magician who can cast blindness spells and conjure magical duplicates of themself.$(br2)

pages.name: Skeleton, Forgotten
pages.text: The haunted remains of an adventurer who died exploring caves.  Only encountered below ground in the blackest depths they will shoot blinding arrows; but sometimes possess valuable treasure.$(br2)

pages.name: Skeleton, Stray
pages.text: Frozen skeletons encountered only in the frigid north.  Their icy errors will chill your blood$(br2)

pages.name: Spirit, Phantom
pages.text: Dark spirits who pursue those beset by nightmares.  Sleep regularly or expect a visit from these wrathful haunts.$(br2)

pages.name: Zombie, Drowned
pages.text: Found commonly in rivers, aquifers and sometimes at sea; they can hurl tridents with deadly accuracy$(br2)

pages.name: Zombie, Husk
pages.text: Dessicated zombies which are immune to the effects of sunlight$(br2)
